triples.name: Statistical machine translation
triples.relevance: The paper proposes enhancements to phrase-based statistical machine translation systems by using neural networks for translation probability estimation.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper uses neural networks as the novel method to directly learn translation probabilities of phrase pairs using continuous representations.

triples.name: Word embedding
triples.relevance: The paper uses continuous representations (word embeddings) to represent phrase pairs for neural network-based translation probability estimation.

triples.name: BLEU
triples.relevance: BLEU score is the evaluation metric used to measure improvements in translation quality achieved by the proposed approach.

triples.name: Moses (machine translation)
triples.relevance: The paper discusses integration of the proposed neural network approach into the Moses decoder for phrase-based statistical machine translation.

triples.name: Machine translation
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the broader task of machine translation by proposing improvements to translation probability estimation in phrase-based systems.
